article_title: As Obamacare And Employers Demand Quality, Orthopedic And Spine Centers Ally

article_metadata.description: Top orthopedic and spine centers are collaborating through a national alliance to link large employers with more cost-effective, quality surgery so their  employees can quickly return to work at a better price. Dr. Todd Albert, orthopedic surgeon and president of The Rothman Institute in Philadelphia talked about the goals of the National [...]
